dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description: Libassuan is a small library implementing the so-called Assuan protocol.
dependencies.name: libassuan

dependencies.description: Common error values for all GnuPG components.
dependencies.name: libgpg-error

dependent_to.description:
An optionally rootless and daemonless container engine: alias
docker=podman
dependent_to.name: podman

dependent_to.description:
skopeo is a command line utility that performs various operations on
container images and image repositories.
dependent_to.name: skopeo

description:
GPGME is the standard library to access GnuPG functions from programming
languages.
name: gpgme

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
